CustomField.description: LAMBDA-68944 Formula to dynamically generate Self Serve URL for the opportunity
CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS($Organization.Id, '00D2x000000qNQa'), HYPERLINK('https://renewals.ignitetech.com/signup?subscriptionId=' & Parent_Subscription_ID__c , 'Manage Subscription', '_blank'), HYPERLINK('https://renewals.dev.ignitetech.com/signup?subscriptionId=' & Parent_Subscription_ID__c, 'Manage Subscription', '_blank') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is dynamically generated to open this Subscription in Self-Serve Portal
CustomField.label: Self Serve Link
